parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that ensures the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value on your client. The token must contain only ASCII characters and be no more than 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese

- en: English

Default value: en.

parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the zone.
